Package com.ansi.scilla.common.claims

Class ClaimsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ansi.scilla.common.claims.ClaimsUtils
  • public class ClaimsUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    There is a minimum_hourly_pay in the ansi_user table and in the division table. If there is insufficient history, use the greater of the those 2 values. If there is sufficient history, use the greatest of: 1. Calculated value 2. User minimum 3. Division minimum
    Author:
    dclewis
